0.symptoms_text: Runny or stuffy nose; Sneezing; Sore throat; Coughing; Mild headache; Fatigue; Low-grade fever

1.symptoms_text: High fever; Chills; Muscle aches; Fatigue; Sore throat; Dry cough; Nasal congestion

2.symptoms_text: Nausea; Vomiting; Diarrhea; Abdominal cramps; Fever; Dehydration

3.symptoms_text: Pain or burning during urination; Frequent urge to urinate; Cloudy or foul-smelling urine; Pelvic pain; Sometimes fever

4.symptoms_text: Sneezing; Runny or congested nose; Itchy eyes, throat, or nose; Watery eyes; Fatigue
